example.text: HR 2 would decimate the border by: ? eliminating critical reimbursements for communities like mine ? cutting NGOs off from federal funds, and ? creating humanitarian catastrophe - by design Watch?? [[url]]

ICYMI: I joined [[user]] this morning to talk about El Paso and the impact of the end of Title 42. We're here because of Congressional inaction over the last several decades, and it'll take a bipartisan solution to solve this humanitarian crisis. [[url]]

Once again this year, I'm proud to announce over $25 million in federal funding that will help support 14 great projects going on in the community, This funding comes from Community Project Funding, and I was proud to host a press conference this month with many of the recipients. To learn more, click here.

NONE of this economic hostage taking was necessary. All these negotiations needed to happen as part of the appropriations process anyway, but [[user]] wanted to placate the extremists in the [[user]]. But this is par for the course for the GOP, which cannot govern. [[url]]

Today I had the honor of meeting with [[user]], the President of Kosovo and an inspiring head of state. It was wonderful to speak about our countries’ promising relationship and ongoing defense & security cooperation. [[url]]

One of the most important aspects of the upcoming Farm Bill reauthorization is its SNAP benefit allotments. It was important for me to discuss today with El Pasoans Fighting Hunger Food Bank how this bill affects their funding and how I can be supportive of their priorities. [[url]]
